body_html:
Found out it is due to cuDNN.

When you download cuDNN, there are texts showing:

Please check your framework documentation to determine the recommended version of cuDNN.
If you are using cuDNN with a Pascal (GTX 1080, GTX 1070), version 5 or later is required.

I tried compiling tensorflow from source with CUDA8.0+cuDNN5.1. Everything works fine.

@physicso please try TF docker with cuDNN-5x.

body:
Found out it is due to `cuDNN`.

When you download `cuDNN`, there are texts showing:

> Please check your framework documentation to determine the recommended version of cuDNN.
> If you are using cuDNN with a Pascal (GTX 1080, GTX 1070), version 5 or later is required.

I tried compiling tensorflow from source with CUDA8.0+cuDNN5.1. Everything works fine.

@physicso please try TF docker with `cuDNN-5x`.
